title: NOPD: 4 shot in Gert Town fatal shooting
content:
​NEW ORLEANS -- Police are investigating a quadruple shooting Tuesday evening in Gert Town that claimed the life of a 19-year-old man.
The shooting happened near the intersection of Fern and Olive streets after 7 p.m.
NOPD spokesman Officer Frank Robertson said one of the victims, a man, has been pronounced dead. Three other victims showed up at the hospital with gunshot wounds. They got to the hospital via private vehicles.
The deceased victim, a 19-year-old man, hasn't been identified. The conditions of the other three victims are unknown.
Police haven't named a suspect or motive in this shooting.
If you know anything that can help investigators, call Crimestoppers at 822-1111.
